metadata.title: CVE-2024-47076 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
cfGetPrinterAttributes5 does not validate IPP attributes returned from anIPP server

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-47076` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcupsfilters-tests - 2.0.0-0ubuntu7.1
libcupsfilters2-common - 2.0.0-0ubuntu7.1
libcupsfilters2t64 - 2.0.0-0ubuntu7.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libcupsfilters package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.0-0ubuntu7.1').
